abstract.p: Computer sales in China grow faster than any other Asian market, up 26 percent over last year (S)

block.p: Computer sales in China are growing faster than in any other market in Asia, itself the region with the fastest-expanding computer market in the world, according to a survey by the Gartner Group and Dataquest. The survey shows that Legend Holdings Ltd. of China has overtaken the International Business Machines Corporation as the top computer vendor in the region, where consumers bought 4.1 million computers in the latest quarter, up 26 percent from the corresponding period last year.
